statements: SELECT * FROM dna_sequence_alignments
SELECT id, sequence_data FROM dna_sequence_alignments
SELECT length, alignment_score FROM dna_sequence_alignments
SELECT id, sequence_data, length, alignment_score FROM dna_sequence_alignments
SELECT * FROM dna_sequence_alignments ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, sequence_data, length, alignment_score FROM dna_sequence_alignments WHERE id = 1 ORDER BY alignment_score DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, length, alignment_score FROM dna_sequence_alignments WHERE length > 100 ORDER BY length ASC
SELECT id, sequence_data, alignment_score FROM dna_sequence_alignments WHERE sequence_data LIKE '%ACGT%' AND alignment_score >= 0.5
SELECT * FROM dna_sequence_alignments WHERE alignment_score < 0.3 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, length FROM dna_sequence_alignments WHERE sequence_data IS NULL
SELECT * FROM dna_sequence_alignments;
SELECT sequence_name, sequence_data FROM dna_sequence_alignments WHERE alignment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM evolutionary_studies WHERE study_name LIKE '%evolution%';
SELECT study_id, study_name, researcher_name FROM evolutionary_studies ORDER BY study_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequence_alignments LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT alignment_id, sequence_name FROM dna_sequence_alignments ORDER BY alignment_id DESC;
SELECT sequence_name, sequence_data FROM dna_sequence_alignments WHERE sequence_name LIKE 'ACGT%';
SELECT study_name, researcher_name, analysis_results FROM evolutionary_studies WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM dna_sequence_alignments JOIN evolutionary_studies ON dna_sequence_alignments.alignment_id = evolutionary_studies.study_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_alignments FROM dna_sequence_alignments;
SELECT * FROM Studies;
SELECT study_id, study_name FROM Studies WHERE study_id = 1;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence FROM DNA_Sequences ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Alignments WHERE sequence_id = 3;
SELECT alignment_id, alignment FROM Alignments WHERE alignment_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM DNA_Sequences;
SELECT sequence FROM DNA_Sequences WHERE sequence_id = 1;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence FROM DNA_Sequences ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT study_id, study_name, study_description FROM Studies WHERE study_id = 3;
SELECT alignment_id, sequence_id FROM Alignments WHERE alignment_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM alignment_sequences;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence, score FROM alignment_sequences WHERE score > 0.8;
SELECT alignment_id, alignment_name, species_name FROM alignment_metadata ORDER BY alignment_name DESC;
SELECT annotation_id, annotation_text, annotation_date FROM sequence_annotations WHERE annotation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT result_date, result_text FROM alignment_results WHERE alignment_id = 3 ORDER BY result_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM alignment_sequences ORDER BY alignment_id DESC, score ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT alignment_name, alignment_date FROM alignment_metadata WHERE species_name = 'Human' AND alignment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT annotation_text, annotation_date FROM sequence_annotations WHERE annotation_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY annotation_id ASC;
SELECT sequence, score FROM alignment_sequences AS seq JOIN alignment_metadata AS meta ON seq.alignment_id = meta.alignment_id WHERE meta.species_name = 'Mouse';
SELECT result_text, result_date FROM alignment_results WHERE alignment_id IN (SELECT alignment_id FROM alignment_sequences WHERE score > 0.8);
SELECT * FROM alignment_sequences;
SELECT alignment_id, sequence FROM alignment_sequences ORDER BY alignment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM alignment_scores WHERE score > 0.5;
SELECT alignment_id, researcher_name FROM alignment_metadata WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT result_id, result_text FROM alignment_results WHERE alignment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM alignment_sequences;
SELECT alignment_id, sequence FROM alignment_sequences WHERE alignment_id = 123 ORDER BY sequence DESC;
SELECT metadata_id, researcher_name, date_created FROM alignment_metadata WHERE researcher_name LIKE '%John%' AND date_created BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT alignment_id, MAX(score) AS max_score FROM alignment_scores GROUP BY alignment_id HAVING max_score > 90;
SELECT alignment_id, COUNT(*) AS total_positions FROM alignment_positions GROUP BY alignment_id ORDER BY total_positions DESC;
